data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Ball safe as Hiroshima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Tokyo at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Throw-in Hiroshima.
Hiroyoshi Takayama signals a free kick to Hiroshima.
In the minute 3, Hiroshima push upfield and Douglas Vieira gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Tokyo defence.
Hiroyoshi Takayama has awarded Hiroshima a corner.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 4, Tokyo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hiroyoshi Takayama awards Tokyo a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Hiroshima in Tokyo.
In the minute 8, Hiroshima are pushing forward but Hayao Kawabe's finish is wide of the goal.
Tokyo have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Tokyo in their own half.
In the minute 11, Tokyo needs to be cautious. Hiroshima have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Tokyo.
Throw-in for Tokyo in the half of Hiroshima.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
Toshihiro Aoyama (Hiroshima) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Hiroshima drive upfield and Douglas Vieira gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Tokyo defender.
In the minute 16, Hiroshima are coming forward and Hayao Kawabe gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Tokyo at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Tokyo drives forward and Taichi Hara gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 19, Toshihiro Aoyama (Hiroshima) strikes â€“ and hits the bar! Ohhhh so close!
Hiroshima's Douglas Vieira misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tokyo.
In the minute 19, Hiroyoshi Takayama awards the away team a throw-in.
Tokyo takes a corner from the right.
Can Hiroshima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tokyo's half?
In the minute 24, Douglas Vieira (Hiroshima) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Manato Shinada is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Ball goes out of play for a Tokyo goal kick.
In the minute 26, Tokyo's Manato Shinada is back in action after a slight knock.
Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
In the minute 30, Hiroyoshi Takayama signals a free kick to Tokyo in their own half.
Throw-in for Hiroshima at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Tokyo to take a throw-in in Hiroshima territory.
In the minute 32, Free kick Hiroshima.
Hiroshima's Yuya Asano is on target but unsuccessful.
Hiroyoshi Takayama signals a Tokyo throw-in in Hiroshima's half.
In the minute 34, Manato Shinada (Tokyo) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Tsukasa Morishima (Hiroshima) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Hiroyoshi Takayama signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Tokyo's half.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Hiroshima in the half of Tokyo.
Hayato Araki (Hiroshima) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Tokyo goal kick.
In the minute 39, Can Tokyo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
In Tokyo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Tokyo's Adailton attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 40, Goal kick for Hiroshima at Ajinomoto Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Hiroyoshi Takayama has awarded Tokyo a corner.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Tokyo in the half of Hiroshima.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Tokyo.
Throw-in for Tokyo in their own half.
In the minute 44, Tokyo are in shooting range from this free kick.
Ball safe as Hiroshima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Tokyo territory.
In the minute 46, Hiroyoshi Takayama awards the home team a throw-in.
Hiroshima have a dangerous throw-in.
Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, Tokyo to take a throw-in in Hiroshima territory.
Throw-in for Tokyo close to the penalty box.
Hiroyoshi Takayama awards Hiroshima a goal kick.
In the minute 52, Yuya Asano (Hiroshima) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Tokyo have a goal kick.
Tokyo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 54, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Shunki Higashi of Hiroshima gets in a strike, but is off target.
Tokyo have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Tokyo in the half of Hiroshima.
Hiroyoshi Takayama signals a throw-in for Tokyo, close to Hiroshima's area.
In the minute 55, Yoshifumi Kashiwa is replacing Yusuke Chajima for the away team.
In the minute 57, Douglas Vieira (Hiroshima) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Tokyo.
Kazuya Konno is on a sub for Kyosuke Tagawa for Tokyo.
In the minute 59, Takumi Nakamura of Tokyo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Tokyo takes a corner from the right.
Goal kick for Hiroshima at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Daiki Niwa has recovered and rejoins the match in Tokyo.
In the minute 64, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Daiki Niwa for Tokyo who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Hiroyoshi Takayama.
In the minute 65, Goal! Hotaka Nakamura gives Tokyo a 1-0 lead in Tokyo.
Hirotaka Mita with an assist there.
Free kick for Hiroshima in the half of Tokyo.
In the minute 69, Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Hiroshima's Tsukasa Morishima gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Tokyo defender.
Can Hiroshima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tokyo's half?
In the minute 70, Shunki Higashi's header is off-target for Hiroshima.
Ball goes out of play for a Tokyo goal kick.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Hiroshima at Ajinomoto Stadium.
Kenta Hasegawa (Tokyo) is making a second substitution, with Kiichi Yajima replacing Adailton.
Hiroyoshi Takayama signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Tokyo's half.
Tokyo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 74, Hiroyoshi Takayama signals a free kick to Tokyo in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Tokyo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 76, Tokyo pushes forward through Manato Shinada, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in their own half.
In the minute 78, The away team replace Yuya Asano with Kosei Shibasaki.
Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Tokyo in the half of Hiroshima.
In the minute 80, Can Tokyo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
Hiroyoshi Takayama awards Hiroshima a goal kick.
Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
In the minute 82, Can Tokyo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hiroshima's half?
Throw-in Hiroshima.
Hiroyoshi Takayama signals a free kick to Tokyo.
In the minute 85, Ball safe as Hiroshima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Hirotaka Mita.
Hirotaka Mita (Tokyo) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Rei Hirakawa.
In the minute 86, Hiroyoshi Takayama signals a free kick to Tokyo in their own half.
In Tokyo Hiroshima attack through Yuki Nogami. The finish is off target, however.
Tokyo have a goal kick.
In the minute 88, Free kick Hiroshima.
Hiroyoshi Takayama signals a free kick to Hiroshima in their own half.
Hiroyoshi Takayama signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Tokyo's half.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Tokyo territory.
Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
Hiroyoshi Takayama signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Tokyo's half.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Tokyo.
Takuya Uchida is back on the pitch.
In Tokyo a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match has come to a close in Tokyo. The final score is 1-0.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Tokyo to check on Takuya Uchida, who is grimacing with pain.
